projects.title: ·ª®ng d·ª•ng ALi Chat
projects.summary: ƒê√¢y l√† ·ª©ng d·ª•ng ch√°t s·ª≠ d·ª•ng MERN stack do m√¨nh thi·∫øt k·∫ø v√† code v·ªõi c√°c ch·ª©c nƒÉng c∆° b·∫£n.
projects.description:
Features

  • Login, Register and Login with Google and Facebook
  • User's profile: update avatar, username allow others search your profile and your story
  • Search users by name and username in search tool
  • Texting feature: allow user send text, emoji and picture
  • Enable user reply a specific message
  • For group-chat feature: ability to add more members and remove if you're an host. Leave group if you're an member

Technologies

  Backend
  • MongoDatabase
  • NodeJS
  • Socket.IO
  • Cloudinary for storing images
  Frontend
  • ReactJS and Redux
  • Socket-Client.IO
  • Material UI

References

projects.title: ALi Chat Application
projects.summary: This is an MERN chat application with several features such as single-chat and group-chat
